animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am very big and gray.
💦 I can spray water from my nose.

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and like to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I love to play with yarn.
🐈 I purr when you pet me.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?
I live in the water and have sharp teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🦷 I have many rows of teeth
🦈 I am a type of fish.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes all over my body. What am I?
I waddle and lay eggs, but I'm not a chicken. What am I?

hints.text: 🦢 I like to swim in ponds.

animal.question: I hop around and carry my baby in a pouch. What am I?
I roar loudly and am known as the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I am a very strong animal.

animal.question: I swing from trees and love to eat bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🍌 I am very good at climbing.

animal.question: I am a bird that can't fly, but I can swim very well. What am I?

food.question: I am yellow and you peel me. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am the color of the sun.
🍌 My shape is long and curved.

food.question: I am round and red, and grow on trees. An apple a day keeps the doctor away! What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am often red, but can be green or yellow too.

food.question: I am white, cold, and sweet. I am a yummy treat on a hot day. What am I?

hints.text: 🍧 I'm often served in a cone or a bowl.
🥶 I will melt if left out in the sun.
🍦 You can have me in many different flavors.

food.question: I am long, orange, and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?
I am a yellow circle, cut into triangles. I have tomato sauce and cheese on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🟡 I can be cut into many slices.
🍅 You can add different toppings to me.

food.question: I am small, green, and grow in a pod. Some people don't like to eat me, but I am healthy. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 My color is the same as grass.

food.question: I am made from milk, but I'm not liquid. I can be yellow or white, and I taste great on pizza or in sandwiches. What am I?

hints.text: 🥪 I am often added to sandwiches.

food.question: I am a seed inside a shell. Squirrels love to bury me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌰 Squirrels store me for the winter.
🌳 Some of us grow on trees.
🍂 I fall from trees in autumn.

food.question: I am small and juicy, and come in bunches. I can be green, red, or purple, and I'm often used to make juice or raisins. What am I?

hints.text: 🍷 I can be used to make wine (but you're too young!).
☀️ I become raisins when I am dried.

food.question: I'm a drink that comes from cows, but I'm not plain white. I am often brown, and you can add me to hot chocolate. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I come from a farm animal.
☕ I make hot chocolate taste even better!
